Package common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseMetadata
    A marker interface that enables multiple metadata sub-types to share a common super-type.
    Directory<T>  
    ImageHandler
    Defines the contract for a handler that is responsible for processing image files and extracting metadata structures.
    Metadata<T>
    Represents a generic metadata container capable of storing and managing directory elements of type T.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractByteReader
    This abstract class provides the functionality to perform reader operations intended for obtaining data from a byte array.
    AbstractImageParser
    An abstract superclass for implementing image file parsers.
    ByteValueConverter
    Utility class providing static methods for converting raw byte arrays to primitive types, strings, and RationalNumber representations, especially in the context of image metadata parsing (e.g., TIFF or PNG).
    ImageFileInputStream
    A utility stream wrapper that simplifies reading binary image data from an InputStream, with support for both big-endian and little-endian formats.
    ImageParserFactory
    A static factory class responsible for returning appropriate image parser instances based on the detected image format from file signature bytes.
    RandomAccessByteReader
    This class performs reader operations intended for obtaining data from a byte array at random.
    RationalNumber
    This class represents a rational number, typically used in the TIFF image format.
    SequentialByteReader
    This class performs reader operations intended for obtaining data sequentially from a byte array containing the raw data.
    TagValueConverter
    Utility class for converting EntryIFD values to human-readable or numeric forms, using hint-aware transformation rules.
    TestScanner
    Obtains metadata from selected supported image file formats.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DigitalSignature
    Enumerates known image formats by identifying their distinct magic numbers in the image file header.
    RationalNumber.DataType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ImageReadErrorException
    This exception is thrown when the running application is terminated abruptly.
